publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-4023 Iain Gray: Railways and Transport Safety Bill - UK Legislation-That the Parliament endorses the principle of introducing alcohol and drug testing for mariners as set out in the Railways and Transport Safety Bill and agrees that the relevant provisions in the bill on these issues that relate to devolved matters should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
